tr.td: Generates Loom/Phoenix Sar files using Maven

section.name: Downloads
section.p:
The Loom plugins are downloadable from
Codehaus Distribution Server.

The Codehaus Distribution artifacts are synched with the IBiblio Maven repository. Simply specify the plugin name as a dependency with type plugin:
<dependency> <groupId>loom</groupId> <artifactId>maven-loom-plugin</artifactId> <version>[plugin-version]</version> <type>plugin</type> </dependency>
